@manuel yes! That is correct, thank you!!

Joe Meets George $45 per adult
Mediterranean Love Affair $60 per adult
Children Meal $25 per child

after they click one menu... automatic the total will compute like

Manuel m

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
@manuel

Can you please setup a gravity form on https://thepapermillfood.com/ with the below fields.

The ‘What menu’ question will need to be a product field type. We will connect this form to Stripe so that payments can be received.

Please include a total field as well. It will need to calculate the ’total guests' multiplied by the menu price (the What menu field)

Thanks!

Hi Heath,

Yay, see below:

Strip log in



In terms of what we require for the booking:

Full name
Email
Phone number
Booking date
Start time (which will run for a 2 hour duration)
Total number of guests
Total number of adults
Total number of children

What menu:
Joe Meets George $45 per adult
Mediterranean Love Affair $60 per adult
Children Meal $25 per child

Are there any special diets?

Will you be bringing a cake (if so a $3 charge to be added per adult)

Let me know if I can assist further in anyway
